description: Synchronize data between a smartphone and a server Synctool can synchronize data between an Android smartphone and a server with FTP and ownCloud. Features Targets * Local Files * Owncloud * FTP Directions * From A to B * From B to A * Both Directories Strategies * Copy new files * Mirror * Copy new files in a folder with actual data * Copy all files in a folder with actual data * Move File * Move in a folder with actual data * One side wins * Date check Trigger * Trigger daily on selected time
